# ML primers

- <i class="fas fa-book"></i> Gareth James, Daniela Witten, Trevor Hastie and Robert Tibshirani'[@james_an_2014]s [_An introduction to statistical learning_](https://www.statlearning.com/) provides a conceptual and practical introduction in R to key ML techniques.

- <i class="fas fa-book"></i> Max Kuhn and Julia Silge [@kuhn_tidy_2022] [_Tidy modeling with R_](https://www.statlearning.com/) demonstrates how to deploy `tidyverse` workflows when working over ML (resampled) model outputs.
